short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make the KLE a little easier to use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension to make the Keyboard Layout Editor better and easier to use.

Properties input
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a97yY9o24Ec
enter - moves to the next element.
shift+enter - moves to the previous element.

Properties Rotation
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r72EE2NGmPI
Focus Mode - Clicking the key focuses in Rotation.

Customize Fonts
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7OfNx2ZCyjc

Export Standard Quality PNG
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nio6RXlDlSc   
The default export image is rough, so it will be decent.
Downloading customized information as an image

source
https://github.com/darakuneko/kle_extension
